pos_examples: Now, turn satellite roof_11 from direction screen to direction bastion.
Once you are done, please take image of direction object_50 using satellite dress_red with instrument fire in mode object_260.
First, switch on instrument kumquat_8 on satellite kumquat and then calibrate satellite yew with instrument socket towards direction rain.
The next step is to switch off instrument kumquat_8 on satellite kumquat.
